abstract: Iraqi military forces continue to hold back on any aggressive ground offensive against Islamic State militants who continue to hold city of Tikrit, despite three days of American airstrikes intended to allow Iraq to press its advantage.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of American airstrikes on Islamic State positions in the city, there seemed to be little urgency to make progress on the ground.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces in No Hurry to Expel ISIS From Tikrit
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces in No Rush to Retake City

snippet: In the wake of American airstrikes on Islamic State positions in the city, there seemed to be little urgency to make progress on the ground.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
